column4: Hi all!! I really want to test out KDE 4.1, am currently using Ubuntu distro 8.04 but I am considering installing Kubuntu 8.10. Anyone advises against it? How usable is KDE as a main desktop environment?
id' hold off on that, what do you need thats in 8.10 that 8.04 doesnt have ?
KDE4 is pretty nice as well,,, ummm but personal i'd get Kubuntu 8.04 over Kubuntu 8.10
